dang / shA ri'i bu dang / kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang / kun dga' bo dang / sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa cang shes pa dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri brgyad stong dag dang thabs cig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de

dag thams cad kyang yun ring por dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa rnams la rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa/ smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong snyed khong du chud cing rtogs pa/ gzungs yongs su rdzogs pa/ snying rje chen

po mi gtong ba/ sems can chen po ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad la phan par brtson pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par 'tshob pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan rnam par 'dzugs pa/ so so'i skye bo'i ma bskul ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ ye shes chen

po'i 'gram du phyin pas kun du grangs med pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag par brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dam pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' glog gi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun du mnyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gtso bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi

glang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag par snying rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang / byang

chub sems dpa' 'od btsan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros tshad med dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems

dpa' seng ge'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon lam rdzogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang

chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de ma yin pa gzhan yang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu tshad med pa brgya stong dag kyang lhags nas lha rdzas kyi me tog dang spos rnams thogs shing / lha rdzas

kyi rol mo dkrol nas steng gi nam mkha' la 'khod do/ /de ma yin pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / de la sogs pa so so nas 'khor brgya

stong snyed lhags nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das la 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor te/ rim gro dang mchod pa byas/ bkur sti dang bcas pas yongs su bstod pa byas so/ /

de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kun dga' bo snga dro'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs nas mthar gyis bsod snyoms blangs so/ /de'i dus na bram ze pha ma la sri zhu cher byed pa/ khyim so zhig nas ci yang mi bdog pa cig kyang ma rgan khur du khyer te/ mthar gyis slongs mo

byed de/ de yang kha zas zhim po ro dang ldan pa'am/ shing tog bzang po dag rnyed na pha ma la stobs so/ /kha zas ngan pa ro med pa'am/ shing tog skam po dag rnyed na bdag rang za'o/ /kun dga' bos de lta bu dag mthong nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ mi de la legs

so/ /legs so zhes snyan par bstod nas/ rigs kyi bu pha ma la sri zhu byed cing mchod pa byed pa ngo mtshar che ste legs so zhes smras so/ /de nas kun du rgyu ston pa drug gi bstan pa la phyogs shing grogs su gyur pa cig dbang po rno la gtsug lag dang / rig byed rnam pa bzhi la mkhas par

gyur pa/ skar ma dang rtsis la mkhas pa/ dge sdig gi ltas rno ba/ mo dang gtsug lag gi rig pas pha rol gyi sems shes pa/ phal mang po'i slob dpon du gyur pa/ kun gyis bkur ba cig lta ba ngan pa la zhen nas khe dang grags pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'jig par byed/

sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la phrag dog byed de smod pa'i phyir kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod kyi ston pa gau ta ma shAka rigs kyi bu nga ni dge ba yin te/ yon tan chen po dang ldan no zhes smra ba yang ming tsam du zad de bden pa'i dngos po med do/ /khyod kyi

ston pa gau ta ma ni yang dag par na sdig pa can yin te/ btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa na ma yang shi bas sdig pa can yin par mngon no/ rgyal po'i pho brang na 'dug pa las pho brang nang nas bros pas yab rgyal po yang mya ngan gyis non te/ sems 'khrugs nas brgyal ba las chus gtor

te/ zhag bdun lon pa dang dran pa phyir rnyed de cho nges btab nas nga'i lha'i bu gcig deng du stor ro zhes snying rje rje skad du ngus nas/ nga'i yul dang srid kyang khyod 'ba' zhig dbang bar zad la bu yang khyod gcig pur zad na ci'i phyir nged spangs te ri dgon par chas zhes smre sngags 'don du

bcug pas khyod kyi ston pa gau ta ma drin mi shes te ci la'ang ma bltas par langs te song bas na sri zhu med par yang mngon no/ /yab rgyal pos pho brang brtsigs nas chung ma blangs pa las kyang chung ma'i las ma byas te mya ngan gyis gdungs par byas pas na khrel med pa yang yin par

mngon no/ /kun dga' bos de skad ces smras pa'i tshig de dag thos nas ngo tsha zhing skyengs te/ bsod snyoms blangs te phyir sangs rgyas ga na bar 'ongs nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i chos la pha ma la sri zhu bgyi ba lta ma mchis sam/ sangs rgyas kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 'di skad du zhu ba 'di khyod la su zhig gis bstan/ lha'am mi'am/ mi ma yin pas bstan tam/ 'on te khyod nyid kyi shes pa'i blos de

bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar gyur ces bka' stsal pa dang / kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bdag la lha'am/ klu'am/ sam/ mi'am/ mi ma lags pa gang gis kyang bstan pa ma mchis te/ snga dro bsod snyoms slong du mchis pa'i shul du ston pa drug gi 'khor kun du

rgyu gcer bu pa zhig dang mjal ba dang / bdag la tshig rtsub mo dag mchi'o zhes rgyas par gsol to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad nas zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od byung bas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong

'das pa'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams bla ma mchog ces bya ba snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/

'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu bkod pa zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai dUr+ya las byas pa/ gser btso mas thig re'u bres pa/ rin po

che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/ shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang tsam du mtho ba/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang 'dab mas shin tu brgyan pa/ rlung mi drag pas bskyod na sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/ sgra de dag so so'i skye bos thos pas mi ngoms pa/ skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu

yod la yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhi na bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad ma dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / pA ru Sha ka dang / de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po shing rta'i phang lo

tsam gyis chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/ chu de'i nang na bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to/ /rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/ de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do/ /rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khri mtho

khyad kyi tshad dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/ lha rdzas kyi na bza' khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gis chal par bkram pa'i khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i rgyal po skyil mo krung du bcas shing bzhugs

pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang

ldan pa/ rab tu gsal ba/ dper mi bzod pa 'di nub phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/ gang la 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad lus dang sems bde bar 'gyur ba de thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces

bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang khyod la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o/ /'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas/ 'khor

mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rngu rtsa nas gdon pa'i phyir/ sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi lam las

phyir mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyis drin lci ba dran par

bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir/ so so'i skye bo mtha' dag pha ma dag la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no/ /de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu

snyed stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya

thub pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag khyed mi mjed

kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang / shin tu phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad

dka' ba spyad de/ snying rje chen pos smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/ gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can ri dang / shang shong dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma dang / tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/

mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang yongs su ldan par byas nas chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byas shing lhag ma ma

lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam du btab bo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar gnas par

bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten

gyi khams gang na ba der song ngo / /de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od zer chen po yang kun du snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po yang char bzhin phab

bo/ /'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so/ /de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod

spungs pa'i ri ga la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba

khrag khrig brgyad cu 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan 'od ces bya ba snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas mtshan mar dgongs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/

bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu dag pa zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai dUr+ya las

byas pa/ gser btso mas thig re'ur bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/ shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / 'dab mas brgyan pa/ rlung mi drag pas bskyod na sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/ sgra de dag so so'i

skye bos thos pas mi ngoms pa/ skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la/ yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing / rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhi na bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad ma dang / puN+Da

rI ka dang / pA ru Sha ka dang / de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po shing rta'i phang lo tsam chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/ chu de'i nang na bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to/ /rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las

byas pa'i gru yod de/ de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do/ /rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khri mtho khyad dpag tshad gcig bshams nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/ lha rdzas kyi na bza' khri'i steng du rim par bting ba lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/

lha rdzas kyi me tog gi chal par bkram pa'i khri de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma dgongs skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la so

so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od zer kha dog bzang po/ kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar por ldan pa rab tu gsal ba dper mi bzod pa 'di/ byang phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag

la snang bar gyur te/ gang la 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad lus dang sems bde bar gyur par thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung

shig dang khyed la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o/ /'di nas byang phyogs logs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu 'das pa'i pha rol na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan

bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rngu rtsa nas 'don pa'i phyir/ sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog cing / brtan par bya ba'i phyir/

nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing / sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyis drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can

thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i phyir/ sa so'i skye bo dag pha ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no/ /de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te/

bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya

thub pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag khyed

mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa dang bkur sti bya ba dang / shin tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad

de/ snying rje chen pos smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/ /gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can/ ri dang / shang shong dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma dang / tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su/ sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa

dang bcas pa/ mtshams med lnga dang / mi dge bcu rdzogs par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/ chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing / lhag ma

ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ ci ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ci ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs

pa dang 'dra bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag

khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song ngo / /de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od zer chen po kun du snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang

las lha rnams kyis me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po yang char bzhin du phab bo/ /'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so/ /de ma yin pa'i gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad

med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod spungs pa'i ri ga la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas

nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gyis nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams dag pa'i gnas zhes bya ba snang bar byas

so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyi zla mar me'i 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na

med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai dUr+ya las byas pa/ gser btso mas thig re'u bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/ shing de dag kyang

mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / 'dab mas shin tu brgyan pa/ rlung mi drag pas bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/ sgra de dag so so'i skye bos thos pas mi ngoms pa/ skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / khrus

kyi rdzing bu yod la yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing / rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhi na bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad ma dang / puN Da rI ka dang / pA ru Sha ka dang / de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang / ser po

dang / dmar po dang / dkar po shing rta'i phang lo tsam chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/ chu de'i nang na yang bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to/ /rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/ de na sems can mang po 'dod

dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do/ /rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khri mtho khyad kyi tshad dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi na bzas khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog

gi chal par bkram pa'i khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla mar me'i 'od skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar por bcas pa dang ldan pa/ rab tu gsal ba/ dper mi bzod pa 'di shar phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/ gang la 'od kyis reg par

gyur pa de dag thams cad lus dang / sems bde bar gyur pa thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu legs par nyon la shin tu yid la legs par zung shig dang / khyed la dgrol

bar bshad par bya'o/ /'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor

nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rngu rtsa nas 'don pa'i phyir/ sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems

dpa' dag byang chub kyi lam las mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab

pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyis drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir/ so so'i skye bo dag pha ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no/ /de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems

dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te/ bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag

rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas

des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang / shin tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad de snying rje chen pos smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/ /gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can/ ri dang / shang shong dang / gyo mo dang /

gseg ma dang / tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su

bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams

der phyin nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar gnas par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/

byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu

g.yos te/ 'od zer chen po yang kun du snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man da ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po yang char bzhin phab bo/ /'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye

ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so/ /de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bya rgod spungs pa'i ri ga la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i

spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gyis byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba

khrag khrig lnga brgya 'das pa'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang phyug grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas pad mo le brgan gyi 'od ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig

pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing

de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai dUr+ya las byas pa/ gser btso mas thig re'u bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/ shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / 'dab mas shin tu brgyan pa/ rlung

mi drag pas bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/ sgra de yang so so'i skye bos thos na mi ngoms pa/ skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la/ yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba

rdzing gi ngos bzhi na bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad ma dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / pA ru Sha ka dang / de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po shing rta'i phang lo tsam du chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/ chu de'i nang na bya rnam pa sna

tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to/ /rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/ de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do/ /rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khri mtho khyad dpag tshad gcig pa

bshams nas rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/ lha rdzas kyi na bzas khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi chal par bkram pa'i khri'i thog na/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i le brgan gyi 'od chags pa/

skyil mo krung du bcas shing bzhugs pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang

po kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar por bcas pa dang ldan pa/ rab tu gsal ba/ dper mi bzod pa 'di lho phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/ gang la 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad lus dang sems bde bar

'gyur ba thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang / khyed la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o/ /'di nas lho

phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su

ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa

chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi zug rngu rtsa nas gdon pa'i phyir/ sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub las phyir mi ldog

cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyis drin lci

ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir/ so so'i skye bo dag pha ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no/ /de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i nang na/ gtso bo dang

ston par gyur pa/ stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs par gyur nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi

mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub

sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang / shin tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas

shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad pas/ snying rje chen pos smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/ /gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can/ ri dang / shang shong dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma dang / tsher

ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/ mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba

thams cad dang ldan par byas nas chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing / lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der

phyin nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar sems par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ byang

chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der dong ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos

te/ 'od zer chen po yang kun du snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po yang char bzhin phab bo/ /'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos

so/ /de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod spungs pa'i ri ga la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs

rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de bzhin du phyogs mtshams bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis so so nas 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa dang bcas te/ bcom ldan

'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ mchod pa dang bkur sti byas/ bstod pa byas nas thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bstod do/ /de ltar sangs rgyas la bstod nas kyang phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe mi

mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang yongs su dag par gyur te/ ri khrad khrod dang / ri chen po dang / chung ngu dang / gtsang po dang / chu klung dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing dang / lteng ka dang / shang shong dang / ngam grog dag med cing / de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'od kyis snang bar

byas pas sangs rgyas gang na ba der lhags te/ dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mig mi 'dzums par chags pa'i yid kyis lta zhing 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer phyir 'dus par mdzad de/ 'od zer de dag gis

sku la lan bdun bskor nas dbu'i spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa kun dga' bos mthong nas 'khor mang po thams cad kyang the tsom skyes par sems kyis rab tu shes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thabs mkhas pa mngon par bstan pa dang / phyis ma 'ongs pa'i

skye bo dag gi shes rab kyi mig skye ba dang / so so'i skye bo thams cad sred pa'i chu klung las rgal zhing pha rol tu phyin pas bde ba la dgod pa dang / so so'i skye bo dag la pha ma dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i drin lci ba dran zhing shes par bya ba'i phyir stan las langs nas/ gos tshags su bcos nas

bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun dga' bos sangs rgyas kyi zhabs 'bring na mchis nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste 'di la nges par

dgongs pa ni mnga' na 'khor mang po'i the tsom gyi dra ba bcad pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyis bshad du gsol/ thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o// //de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor mang po

'dus pa der rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i pad ma'i sdong po dngul las byas/ 'dab ma ni gser las byas/ gzhi ni rin po che shel las byas/ mu tig gi dra bas kun du brgyan pa gcig sa de nyid nas byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa las bzhengs nas

pad mo de la skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs so/ /de la bzhugs ma thag tu yongs su dag pa'i sku mngon par bstan to/ /sku de las lam rgyud lnga'i lus kyi tshogs bstan/ lus kyi tshogs re re la yang gzugs tha dad pa rnam pa khri brgya stong snyed bstan to/ /gzugs rnam pa de re re la yang sku'i

tshogs brgya stong snyed bstan/ sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs snyed bstan to/ /gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang gling bzhi'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan to/ /rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la

yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan to/ /rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang phyogs bcur phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan nas/ nam mkha'i

dbyings kyis klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed kyi sems can gyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan to/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas de snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan nas kun dga' bo dang phyogs bcu nas 'dus shing tshogs pa'i byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag deng de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag pa'i tshig gang yin pa de bka' stsal bar bya'o/ /chos la tshig tu brjod pa med mod kyi

de bzhin gshegs pas thabs mkhas pa'i dbang gis mtshan ma dang / ming med pa'i chos la ming dang mtshan mar bstan par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thog mar skyes shing 'khor bar 'khor ba'i tshe bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa de dag

thams cad rdzogs par myong ste/ de ltar lus kyi tshogs de dag kun myong bas na/ sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha mar ma gyur pa med/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sems can gyi pha mar ma gyur pa med de/ pha mar gyur

pa thams cad kyi phyir rgyun du shin tu spyad dka' ba yang spyad/ shin tu gtang dka' ba yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang / mig dang / klad rgyas dang / yul dang / grong khyer dang / chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo dang / ban glang dang / rta dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi

shing rta dang / theg pa dang / gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad gang yang ma btang ba med do/ /shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / sbyin pa byas pa dang / mang

du thos pa dang / bsam gtan bsgoms pa dang / shes rab spyad pa nas spyod dka' ba thams cad spyad de/ skyo ba dang / ngal ba med cing rgyun mi 'chad par brtson 'grus su 'bad pa yang pha ma la sri zhu bya ba dang / drin shes pa dang / drin lan bsab pa dang / sems

can thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / de ltar na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin chen po yod par shes par bya ba dang / de

bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / rtag par shin tu thabs mkhas pas khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du mnyam snyoms pa'i byams

pa bsgoms shing / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i thabs mkhas pas spyod de/ sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / chos stong pa nyid dang / phung po lnga stong pa nyid du rtogs shing phyir mi nur ba dang / mi 'bying ba dang / mi rgod pa stong pa nyid du

yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la thabs mkhas pas bsgom par bya ba dang / theg pa gsum mi spong zhing chub par slob pa'i thabs la mkhas pas shin tu zab mo'i spyod yul dam pa spyad pa la thabs mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu gsal bar rtogs te/

sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thog ma dang tha ma'i bar du gcig ma yin par rtogs shing chud kyang so so'i skye bo dag ni myos shing bslad pas gdung ba gsum gyis yongs su gdungs te/ sdug bsngal gyi mtshor nub par gyur to/ /phyin ci log bzhis bsgribs pas zag pa dang bcas

pa'i chos la phyin ci log tu gyur to/ /mi bden pa kun tu rtogs pas bdag med pa la bdag tu lta/ mi rtag pa la rtag par lta/ mi bde ba la bde bar lta/ mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar lta zhing skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi bas gzir te skad cig tu mi rtag pas sgrib pa

lnga dang / kun nas glags pa bcus kun du glags te/ srid pa gsum du 'khor zhing skye shi thog ma dang tha ma med pa myong bar gyur to/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang cir 'phrod pa bzhin sde snod gsum dang / mdo sde dgu nas mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi bar du rnam par phye

zhing bstan to/ /so so'i 'dod pa bzhin mdo sde mang po gsungs so/ /tshig la chags pa kha cig bdag ni 'di kho nas chog ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob ces 'dzin pa yang yod do/ /de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi thugs rje chen po'i smon lam gyi shugs

kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na las 'thun pa thams cad bsdus so/ /de ltar las 'thun pa kun 'dus pa 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor der dam pa'i chos mdo sde gsungs par dgongs te/ gzugs brnyan gyi chos nam du yang rgyun mi 'chad cing so so'i skye bo thams

cad bde ba chen po thob par mdzad do/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'dul zhing ston pa yang dus las mi yol bar shes/ dus las mi yol bar mya ngan las 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams kha cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes grags

so/ /skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas su gshegs nas lha rnams kyi ston pa mdzad do/ /skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas nas babs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du sku tshe lo brgyad cur bzhugs pa yang ston to/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab

bo/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can gyi bsam pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /klu'i mthu yang bsam gyis mi

khyab bo/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi thugs la dgongs pa shes par 'dod na sems can dbang po zhan pa tha ma'i bar du yang kun shes par mdzad do/ sems can thams cad las gang yang sangs rgyas

mthong bar 'dod na de ma thag tu mthong bar mdzad do/ /gal te mthong bar mi mdzad na mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo / /de bas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa yod kyang mthong bar mi nus so/ /de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs

rgyas kyis 'od zer chen po bkye nas srid pa'i rtse mo man chad mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad snang bar mdzad kyang gang 'dul ba'i skal ba dang ldan pas ni mthong bar 'gyur/ gang skal ba dang mi ldan pas ni mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo / de bzhin

gshegs pa skabs kha cig tu ni ched du skul ba mdzad/ skabs kha cig tu ni cang mi gsung bas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ shin tu dpag par dka' ba/ shin tu shes shing rtogs par dka' na/ ji ltar khyod kyis de bzhin

gshegs pa la spyod dka' ba shin tu zab mo dri ba la spobs par gyur/ khyod kyis zhus pa 'di ni yang dag par sems can thams cad la byams shing snying brtse ba yin te/ ngan 'gro gsum gyi lam bkag nas lha dang mi'i lam btod pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo ngas da khyod

la pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i spyad dka' ba mdo tsam zhig bstan par byas legs par nyon la yid la zung shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

sngon byung ba bskal pa tshad med pa mtha' yas grangs med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na yul bA rA Na sIr sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten

mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ 'jig rten gyi gtso bo/ /lha dang mi'i ston pa 'jig rten du byung ngo / /sangs rgyas de'i sku tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur bzhugs so/ /dam pa'i chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur gnas

so/ /gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur gnas so/ /gzugs brnyan gyi chos la spyod pa'i tshe mi'i rgyal po rA dza zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ yul bA rA Na sI la dbang sgyur ro/ /rgyal po de la btsun mo ni nyi khri yod/ blon po ni bzhi stong snyed yod/

bal gyi glang po che yang lnga brgya yod/ rgyal phran drug cu la dbang / grong khyer brgyad brgya zhig yod/ rgyal po de la rgyal bu gsum yod de/ gsum char yang rgyal phran re re byed do/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na yul bA rA Na sI'i rgyal po de mkhas shing shes rab dang ldan te/ rtag

tu yang drang ba'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin pas gang yang gtams las chad ces bya ba med do/ /rgyal po'i bsod nams dang yon tan gyi mthus char chu dus las mi yol te/ lo tog rgyun du legs pas de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang bde skyid do/ /de'i tshe na bA rA Na sI'i rgyal po

de la blon po nag po sgra gcan zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ /blon po sgra gcan rgyal po la 'khus nas dmag rnam bzhi bshams pa la 'di lta ste/ bal glang gi tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs bshams

nas bA rA Na sI'i rgyal po la brgal nas rgyal po'i srog bcad do/ /de ltar rgyal po bsad nas kyang dmag gi tshogs rnam pa bzhi bkye nas mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu rab kyang bsad do/ /de nas rgyal bu 'bring po yang phab nas mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu tha thog tu dmag drang bar

bshams so/ /rgyal bu tha de ngo mtshar du gzugs byad bzang la/ 'phags par mdzes shing rang bzhin gyis dge ba/ dul ba/ 'dzum zhing smra ba smra'o cog kyang phan pa'i don du smra zhing 'gyur gyi gnod pa med pa/ rtag tu drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin te/

log pas mi 'tsho bas yul gyi mi rnams kyang bde skyid la dar ba/ longs spyod dang nor rin po cher ldan pa/ bang mdzod gang ba/ rgyal po de'i yon tan la kun gyis bsngags shing bstod pa/ bar snang gi lha dang / 'jig rten gyi lha thams cad kyis kyang dga'

zhing bkur ba/ de'i tshe na rgyal po de la rgyal bu su sha de ba zhes bya ba gcig pu zhig yod de/ shin tu yid gzhungs shing gsal ba/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ lus kyi mdog gser du 'dug pa/ gnas bdun mnyam par

gang ba/ skyes bu'i mtshan rdzogs par ldan pa/ lo bdun lon pa zhig yod pa de la/ yab rgyal po yang shin tu byams shing sdug par sems so/ /de'i tshe na pho brang srung ba'i lha zhig rgyal po de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po mkhyen tam/ blon po

sgra gcan 'khus nas yul srid phrogs te rgyal po yab kyang bkrongs/ dmag gi tshogs bzhi yang bkye nas/ rgyal po gcen gnyis kyang srog gi dbang po dang phral te/ dmag gi tshogs rnams ring po mi thogs par 'dir phyin na rgyal po ci'i phyir srog bskyabs shing

gud du mi 'gro /de'i tshe rgyal po des de skad smras pa thos nas lus kyi ba spu kun zing zhes byed de/ lus kyang 'dar nas yi mug cing mya ngan gyis sems gdungs te/ sa la 'gre zhing brgyal bar gyur nas ring zhig lon pa dang / cung zad sangs te dal gyis nam

mkha'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ltar smra ba'i skad ni yod la gzugs ni mi snang ba khyod ci yin/ smras pa'i tshig 'di yang dag par bden nam/ lhas smras pa bdag ni rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba'i lha yin te/ rgyal po khyod shes pa dang ldan zhing bsod

nams dang yon tan du bcas pas drang po'i chos kyis yul srid 'dzin te/ de bas na bdag gis sngar smras pa yin te/ sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs par ma gyur par myur du byol zhing 'gro ba'i rigs so/ /de nas rgyal po de pho brang du zhugs nas da ni bdag yul gzhan

zhig tu 'gro dgos so snyam du bsams so/ /yang 'di snyam du bsams so/ /yul pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam gnyis yod do/ /lam nye bar zhugs na ni zhag bdun gyis yul pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur/ lam ring por zhugs na ni zhag bcu bzhis phyin par 'gyur bas/

ci nas lam nye bar 'gro'o snyam bsams nas zhag bdun gyi rgyags dang chas te/ pho brang gi phyi rol tu phyin pa dang / phyir pho brang gi nang du log nas rgyal bu su sha de ba pang du blangs te mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing dngangs pa ltar langs nas phyir yang 'dug go/ /de'i tshe na btsun mos

de ltar mi bde zhing skrag pa ltar gyur pa mthong nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rgyal po chen po/ ci'i slad du 'jigs shing skrag pa lta bu'i gzugs ston cing sku la yang rdul gyis gos pa lta bu/ skra yang 'dzings te/ dbugs kyang mi bde ste/ yul stor la

thug pa'am/ mdza' sdug pa dang bye ba'am/ dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa lta bu dang / bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan ma dag gda' ba 'di ci lags bstan du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ kho bo ci nyes pa khyod kyis shes pa ma yin gyis ma smra zhig btsun mos gsol pa/

bdag dang rgyal por lus gzugs gnyis kyang sems gcig ste/ dper na bya'i 'dab ma gnyis sam/ lus kyi rkang pa gnyis sam/ mgo'i mig gnyis sam/ de dang 'dra na ci'i slad du bdag la gsang ste mi gsung / rgyal pos

btsun mo la smras pa/ khyod mi shes sam/ blon po sgra gcan ngan sems skyes nas rgyal po la 'khus te yab rgyal po yang bkrongs te gcen rgyal bu gnyis kyi srog gi bar chad byas nas da ltar dmag dang chas te nga la rgol du 'ong bas/ kho bo yul gzhan du 'byol du 'gro zhes

smras nas rgyal bu dge don pang du blangs te lam du zhugs so/ /de nas btsun mo yang rgyal po'i phyir 'brangs te song ngo / /de'i tshe rgyal po mya ngan gyis non te/ yid 'khrugs nas zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas lam yang nor te/ lam de yang bgrod dka' zhing rtswa

yang rtsub/ rtswa chu tsam yang med de/ zhag du ma zhig song song ba las rgyags kyang chad do/ /thog ma gsang ste rgyal po gcig pu 'gro bar byas nas zhag bdun gyi rgyags las kyang ma brdzangs pa las lam yang nor/ mi gsum gyis kyang zos te/ zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du

zhugs pas da dung lam ring zhig yod pa las rgyags kyang chad nas de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mos skad phyung nas ngus so/ /kyi hud kyi hud re sdug thog ma btsas nas da tsam gyi bar du 'di 'dra ba ma myong ba da 'dir myong bar gyur te/ da 'dir sdug cing phongs so zhes zer te lag pas mgo

la brdabs so/ /sa la 'gre zhing lus la rdul gyis gos nas tshig 'di skad du smre sngags 'don to/ /bdag cag gis tshe snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci zhig byas/ 'on te pha ma dang dgra bcom pa bsad dam/ 'on te dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab bam/ 'on

te 'thun pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis sam/ 'on te rngon pa dang / nya pa byas sam/ 'on te srang dang bre bcos te pha rol la phrog rlom byas sam/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi nor la spyod spyod dam/ ci byas na 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur ces de skad smre zhing cung

zad bstir ni dgras slebs na srog gi bar chad nges par 'byung / lam du zhugs nas 'gror ni bkres pa dang skom pas nyen nas/ srog la bab tu cha'o/ /rgyal po dang btsun mo de lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen te skad phyung ste ngus pa dang sa la 'gyel nas brgyal bar gyur to/ /

de nas ring zhig lon pa dang sangs nas 'di snyam du gsum char lhan cig tu 'di kho nar 'chi bar 'gyur gyis/ btsun mo bsad la bdag dang bu'i srog thar bar bya'o snyam bsams nas ral gri phyung ste btsun mo bsad par bshams pa dang / rgyal bu dge don gyis rgyal po'i

lag pa nas bzung ste/ da ltar ci zhig mdzad dgongs zhes gsol to/ /yab rgyal pos mig nas mchi mas gang bzhin du rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod kyi ma btsun mo dam pa bsad la khyod kyi srog gso snyam mo/ /gal te ma bsad kyang / rang 'chi bar 'gyur

te/ kho bo ni 'chi 'am gson yang rung na bu khyod kyi srog gso ba'i phyir khyod kyi ma btsun mo bsad snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te btsun mo bsad par gyur na de'i sha la bdag mi 'tshal te/ gang na yang ma'i sha

la bu za ba mi srid pas bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur na yab rgyal po ci'i slad du bdag bkum ste/ pha ma'i srog thar bar mi mdzad/ yab rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas mod la 'khams te 'gyel nas sa la 'gre zhing rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod kho bo'i mig

dang 'dra na su zhig rang gi mig phyung ste za bar byed/ kho bo ni shi'ang bla bas bu mi gsod do/ /bu bsad de sha za mi nus so/ /de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis yang yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te yab yum gyis bdag bkum na sha khrag kyang ring po mi thogs

par rul sungs nas dgos pa ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bdag gis gsol ba gcig cig ma gnang na byams pa'i yab yum ma lags pas bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas yab rgyal pos sras rgyal bu la khyod kyi yid dang mi 'gal bar bya bas ci gsol

ba rnams myur du smros shig ces bsgo ba dang / rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /yab yum gyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du nyin re re zhing bdag gi lus las sha rgya ma gsum gsum bcad de/ cha gnyis ni yab

yum la 'bul/ cha gcig ni bdag rang 'tshal na lus srog gi zungs su 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal pos kyang rgyal bus gsol pa bzhin du gnang nas nyin gcig bzhin sha rgya ma gsum gsum bcad de/ cha gsum du bgos nas/ cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang btsun mo za/ /

cha gcig ni rgyal bu rang za ste/ lus dang srog gi zungs byas nas lam du zhugs te song song ba las zhag gnyis kyis yul pha rol ma slebs par rgyal bu'i lus kyi sha zad de rus pa'i tshigs dang chu ba tsam zhig 'brel te srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig lus nas sa la 'gyel to/ /de

nas rgyal po dang btsun mos rgyal bu pang du blangs nas skad chen po phyung nas cho nges chen po btab ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /nged gnyis kyis ma rig pas khyod kyi sha zos te khyod 'di lta bu'i na tsha ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur la/ lam yang da dung ring bas/ khyod kyi lus kyi

sha ni zad de/ da ni lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro gzhag go/ /de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis skad chung ngus yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /da 'di nas pha rol tu zhag gcig tsam gyi lam las ma lus te/ bdag ni g.yo zhing bskyod mi nus pas srog 'dir 'dor ro/ /rgyal

po dang btsun mo ni mi ma rabs ngan pa ltar lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro gzhag go ma gsung shig /bdag la byams shing thugs brtse bar dgongs na bdag gis bsams pa dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol/ da dung yang bdag gi rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa ma lus par btogs

la yul pha rol tu gshegs su gsol/ de nas rgyal pos yang rgyal bus gsol pa bzhin du tshigs dang rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa zad par btogs nas cha gsum du bgos te/ cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang btsun mos zos/ cha gcig ni rgyal bu rang gis zos te/ rgyal po

dang btsun mo yang lam du zhugs nas dong ngo / /rgyal bu dge don langs nas 'greng bzhin du rgyal po dang btsun mo song ba la blta'o/ /rgyal po dang btsun mo gnyis skad phyung nas ngu zhing song nas rgyal bu dge don gyis mig gis mi sod kyi bar du rgyal po dang btsun mo la chags pa'i sems

kyis mig mi 'dzums par blta blta nas ring zhig lon pa dang phyir sa la 'gyel to/ /sha dang khrag gi dri bro bas phyogs bcu nas sbrang ma dang sha sbrang mang po 'dus nas rgyal bu yog pa tsam du lus la za zhing 'dzugs te sdug bsngal gyis gdungs so/ /de'i tshe na rgyal bu de srog

gi lhag ma tsam zhig ma chad de skad phyung nas 'di skad ces smon lam du btab bo/ /bdag gi sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las rnams ni 'dis byang zhing zad par gyur cig /deng slan chad mi bgyid do/ /bdag gi lus pha ma la phul te sbyin pa byas pas bdag gi pha ma snga ma bas lhag

pa'i bsod nams bcu gcig dang ldan te bde bar nyal ba dang / bde bar sad pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa mi rmi ba dang / lhas srung ba dang / mis bkur ba dang / zhal mchu dang / rkun po dang / dgra dang / rku lto byed pa med cing dus thams cad du bkra shis par shog shig /

bdag gi lus lhag ma tsam sha khrag sbrang ma la byin pas thams cad du 'grangs shing tshim par gyur te bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas su grub par shog shig /sangs rgyas su grub nas chos kyi sku thob nas kyang chos kyi skus thams cad kyi bkres skom pa'i mu ge dang skye shir 'khor

ba'i nad lci ba sel bar shog shig /rgyal bus de skad ces smon lam btab pa na gnam sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ nyi ma yang 'od mi gsal bar gyur/ gcan gzan dang rnams kyang skrag nas kun tu rgyug /rgya mtsho yang rab tu 'khrugs/ ri rab kyang 'gul

zhing ldeg /sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi bar du yang rab tu g.yos so/ /de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dag dang 'dzam bu'i gling dag tu babs nas rgyal bu dge don bsdigs pa'i phyir seng ge dang / stag dang / 'phar spyang la sogs pa'i lus

su sprul nas mig bgrad kha gdangs/ spu bsgrengs nas skad chen po'i nga ro phyung ste/ rgyal bu la mchong ba bzhin bsdigs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal bu dge don gyis gcan gzan khro bo de dag mthong nas kyang skad mi che bas 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyed rnams

kho bo za 'dod na ci bder zo zhig /'di 'dra ba'i mthu rtsal gyis bsdigs ci dgos zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ bdag cag ni seng ge'am gcan gzan ma yin gyi/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po yin te khyod bgam zhing sad du 'ongs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal

bus brgya byin lha'i dbang po mthong nas shin tu dga' mgu rangs par gyur to/ /de nas brgya byin gyis rgyal bu la smras pa/ khyod kyis shin tu gtong dka' ba btang ste/ lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la bstabs pa 'di'i bsod nams kyis khyod bdud kyi rgyal po 'dod dam/ 'on

te tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'dod dam/ lha'i dbang po'am/ mi'i rgyal po'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dod/ rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag ni bdud kyi rgyal po'am/ tshangs pa'am/ lha'i rgyal po'am/ mi'i rgyal po'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po

gang yang mi 'dod de/ sems can thams cad rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod do/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod ni shin tu yang gti mug can zhig yin pa 'dra/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni yun

ring po nas shin tu dka' ba bsgrubs pas gdod 'grub ce'o/ /khyod kyis shin tu sdug bsngal ba bzod dam/ rgyal bus smras pa/ gal te lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba bdag gi spyi bo'i steng nas rgyun du 'khor yang sdug bsngal de tsam gyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod kyis smras pa stong pa 'di la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/ de nas rgyal bus dam bcas nas smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/ /gal te bdag gis smras pa'i tshig te/ lha'i dbang po

bslus par gyur na bdag gi lus kyi rma 'di nam du yang 'tsho bar ma gyur cig /gal te smras pa'i tshig bden na/ bdag gi lus kyang sor chud cing khrag kyang 'o mar gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu lus kyi rma yang snga mkho bzhin sor chud de/ khrag kyang 'o mar gyur nas rgyal bu'i byad

gzugs kyang snga ma bas lhag par bzang zhing sdug pa dang mdzes par gyur te langs nas lha'i dbang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal bu khyod legs so/ /shin tu legs so/ /shin tu dpa' ba'i brtson 'grus kyis gdon mi za

bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro/ /ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa na/ thog mar bdag gi don mdzad par gyur cig ces smras nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang nam mkha'i phyogs de nyid du mi snang bar gyur

to/ /de'i tshe yang rgyal po dang btsun mo yang rgyal po pha rol po de'i drung du phyin nas rgyal po des kyang rgyang ma nas bsu nas dgos pa'i yo byad yid bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mo des rgyal bu'i lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la ji ltar bstabs pa rgyal po de la zhib tu

brjod pa dang / rgyal po des ji ltar gyur pa de dag thos nas rgyal bu des lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la bstabs pas sri zhu cher byas pa'i drin lan bsabs nas/ dmag rnam bzhi bshams nas rgyal po de dang yul bA rA Na sIr dmag drangs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po de dmag rnam bzhi

dang chas nas lam du zhugs te/ rgyal bu dang bral ba'i gnas su phyin pa dang / 'di snyam du bdag gi bu ni gdon mi za bar 'di nyid du shi na bu'i rus pa tsam bsdus te phyir bdag gi yul du bkur ro snyam du bsams nas skad phyung nas ngu zhing bu'i rus bu sdud du song song ba las rgyang ma nas

bdag gi bu lus kyi rma yang sos nas snga bas kyang bzang zhing mdzes te drung du 'ongs so/ /de nas rgyal pos pang du blangs te khyod da dung gson nam zhes smras pa dang / rgyal bus ji ltar gyur pa/ yab rgyal po dang btsun mo la smras so/ /rgyal po dang btsun mo rab tu dga' ste/ thams

cad ban glang la zhon nas phyir bdag gi yul du phyin pa dang / rgyal bu de'i bsod nams kyi mthus bdag gi yul yang phyir thob nas rgyal bu don grub rgyal por dbang bskur te rgyal por bcug go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de'i tshe de'i

dus na yab rgyal por gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yab rgyal po de ni da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na yum du gyur pa de ni gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems

na de de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni da ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes zhes bya ba yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu don grub ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu de ni da ltar shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba nga yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i

dus na brgya byin lha'i dbang por gyur pa de ni da ltar kun shes kau Di n+ya zhes bya ba yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis pha ma la sri zhu byed pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag nyi shu snyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don la

mkhas pa'i tshig gi spobs pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bcu gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la chos kyi bzod pa thob bo/ /gzhan yang phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rdul phra rab snyed kyis theg pa gnyis kyi sems spangs

te theg pa gcig gis mthar phyin par gyur to/ /dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rdul phra rab snyed kyis 'bras bu dang po nas theg pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to/ /lha dang mi brgya stong snyed ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /

de ma yin pa lha dang / klu dang / dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i tshogs mang po rnams la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas nyan

thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems bskyed par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir lus kyi sha dang khrag gis kyang pha ma la bstabs shing shin

tu spyad dka' ba spyod pa ni 'di lta bu yin no/ /'khor mang po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas so so nas phan pa dang bde ba'i don rnyed de/ dga' mgu rangs nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas phyir dong ngo / /thabs

mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las sri zhu'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// //thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo/ bam po gnyis pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po'i nang

na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis skar ma mang po zil gyis mnan pa lta bu'am/ klu 'khyil pa'i 'ja' tshon ltar 'tsher zhing gsal ba la lta na mig mi chags pa bzhin nam/ bsams na yid 'khrul pa tsam du 'od zer lham me/ lhang nger bzhugs te/ dper mi bzod pa ni srin bu

me khyer gyi 'od nyi ma shar ma thag tu mi snang ba'am/ nyi zla la 'od zer brgya stong snyed yod kyang brgya byin gyi drung na sol phung lta bu'am/ brgya byin la 'od gsal ba yod kyang tshangs pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi drung na gyo mo'am/ gseg ma lta bu'am/ mtshan mo dang nor bu rin po che'i

'od du bsgrun pa tsam mam/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po la 'od zer dam pa brgya stong snyed yod pa'i 'od thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi drung na sol ba'i phung po ltar gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi mdog gang gis phyogs

bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar gyur to/ /de dag na gnas pa'i sems can dag la 'od zer des reg na dmus long ni mig gis gzugs mthong bar 'gyur/ lus sgur po ni lus rangs par 'gyur/ dbang po nyams pa rnams ni dbang po tshang zhing yan lag

dang nying lag dang ldan par 'gyur/ myos pa rnams ni dran pa phyir rnyed par 'gyur/ mdor na ji tsam du yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad dang bral te 'dod pa bzhin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

bdun cu snyed stan las langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /thams cad kyis skad 'thun par tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/

byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtog med dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' bde ba 'ba' zhig sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshad med dbyangs dang / byang chub

sems dpa' grags pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtsug phud 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig rol dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtog pa spong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes brtsegs dang /

byang chub sems dpa' dge gnas blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mtshan med dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'od zer dang / byang chub sems dpa' khro zhi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bsrung 'gyur dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad

pa btsan dang / byang chub sems dpa' me tog 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bde dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i shes rab las dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo 'phral 'chad dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsam du med pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa sbyin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen las dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i me tog gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpag med chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags

pa'i yid dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu 'chang dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa chen pos skyong dang /

byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba rol dang / byang chub sems dpa' de na gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu lci ba'i sdong

po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyu las 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu 'gro dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sde chen mkhas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ris skyob dang / byang chub sems

dpa' 'jig rten gsum 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo 'phral yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa brjod dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge btsan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dus tshod rgyal po dang /

byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' srid mngon ston dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od rgyang gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i ri dang / byang chub sems dpa' srid len sbyin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba sbyin

dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' mgu rangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtan dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gribs med dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags ldan dang / byang chub sems

dpa' 'jigs med dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma chags lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgron ma chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thabs chen stobs dang /

byang chub sems dpa' mun nag sel dang / byang chub sems dpa' mnyam med phyogs la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar yi dam 'di skad bcas so/ /bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las

'das pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi chos bsrung zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rgyas par bgyi zhing rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong nas 'od zer de dag las

sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab par yang thos par 'gyur/ chos de dag thos nas sems kyi sgrib pa dang bral te kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad byang nas/ lha'i rin po che gser ltar sems rnam par dag par gyur pas thams cad gsal bar snang bar

gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /bdag cag gis phan pa dang / bde ba'i yon tan 'di lta bu dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa la ston pa chen por 'du shes skyes so/ /byams pa'i pha ma lta bu'i 'du shes skyes nas rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran te sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin shes par

bgyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dam pa'i chos thos pas ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te sems can thams cad sgrol bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag kyang chos thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun cu po 'di dag yun ring po nas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi

sngon rol na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed la bsnyen bkur byas te/ sangs rgyas de dag las rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad cing rgyal ba de dag la mi skyo ba'i sems kyis mnyes par byas nas/

byams pas bdag gi lus bsrungs te sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dzin cing snying rje chen pos rgyun du phyogs bcur thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed do/ /sems can gang zhig tha ma shi kar byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gcig gi ming ngam/ gnyis sam/

gsum mam/ bzhi nas bdun cu'i bar du rdzogs par thos te/ de la srog phyogs skyabs su song na tshe 'phos ma thag tu gang na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su pad mo las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing 'dod chags dang yongs su bral ba dang / mngal

gyi gnas nas mi skye ba dang / mnam zhing btsog pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag cing lus dri zhim pa dang / thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti byed par 'gyur ro/ /kun gyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti byas pas sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /

sems rab tu dga' bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par 'gyur/ de ltar

byams pa dang snying rje'i sems bskyed pas 'gro ba ma lus pa la btang snyoms su mi gtong ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ gzhan yang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i sems dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang /

bar chad du 'gyur ba bsal ba'i sems dang / nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen cing rtag tu bkur sti byed pa'i sems dang / 'dun pa'i yid kyis chos nyan pa'i sems dang / mi brjed par yid la byed cing don bzang po

gzungs su 'dzin pa'i sems dang / nyung du thos la don mang du shes pa'i sems dang / mang du thos la don mi shes pa mi 'dod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang dag pa nyid la dang ba'i sems dang / de bzhin nyid kyi don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skye bar

'gyur/ yang dag pa'i don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skyes pas ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skyes pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ de

ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skyes pas sems can de dag thams cad la mnyam snyoms pa'i gnyen po'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bdag khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu lngar skye bar mi dga' ba bzhin du gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / rkang bzhi

dang / rkang dang / grog sbur nas srog chags thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog gi bar du stor yang pha rol po'i srog 'phrog pa'i las mi byed do/ /ji ltar bdag la nor rdzas dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / zas

dang / skom dang / ban glang dang / shing rta dang / theg pa dang / yul dang / grong khyer dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / lus kyi yan lag gi bar du longs spyod rnams la srung zhing rim gro byed do/ /gzhan gyis khyer zhing 'phrog pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du

sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang sems can rnams kyi nor dang / gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / longs spyod la 'phrog pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /ji ltar bdag gi

gzugs dam pa sring mo'am/ chung ma'am/ slas la gzhan gyi mi rigs par byed mi 'dod pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang pha rol po'i gzugs dam pa la 'du shes

ngan pa log pa'i sems mi skyed na mi rigs pa'i chos ngan pa lta ci smos/ ji ltar bdag phra ma dang tshig rtsub po 'khrug par 'gyur ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang

srog yal yang du smra ba dang / phan tshun 'khrug pa'i tshig mi smra'o/ /ji ltar bdag rdo dbyug gis rdeg pa dang / lcag gis gzhu ba dang / nan la 'bor ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems

dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang rdo dbyug dang / lcag dang chad pas gcad pa'i las kyis sems can rnams la mi 'tshe'o/ /ji ltar bdag lcags sgrog dang / khong sgril dang / mtshon cha dang / bzung ba dang / btags pa dang / bcing bas bcings

pa'i gnod pa rnams la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can kun kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog yal yang lcags sgrog dang / khong sgril dang / bzung ba dang / bcing ba la sogs pa gnod pas 'tshe bar mi byed do/ /ji ltar

bdag gzhan gyis brnyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag shul byed pa dang / dbang rlom btsan byed bsnyems shing ngan du byed pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gcig pu'i lus dang srog yal

yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i mi rigs pas sems can la gnod pa mi byed do/ /ji ltar bdag la pha rol po gzhan gyis bkur sti byed cing mchod dam tshig snyan pas bstod na/ bdag bde ba la dga' ba bzhin du bdag kyang sems can rnams la gos dang / zas dang /

skom dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sbyin par byed do/ /gal te bdag gis las chen po zhig sgrub pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi phyir ram/ chos kyi phyir ram/ dge 'dun gyi phyir ram/ don sgrub pa las blos mi lcogs

te don grub par ma gyur nas/ mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis gdungs pa las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag gis bsgrub pa'i don ma grub pas mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed par mthong na bdag la 'di skad zer ro/ /rigs kyi bu khyod mi dga' ba ma byed cig /khyod

kyi don grub pa'i grogs bya ste/ don yid bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/ /zhes zer na de la rab tu dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ de bas na bdag gis sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du bsgrub pa'i las kyi grogs bya'o/ /

ji ltar bdag la rgyal po dang / rkun po dang chu'am/ mes gnod par 'gyur ram/ blon po la sogs pas/ bzung ngam/ btags sam/ bcings na mi dga' ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur pa las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag de ltar mya

ngan gyis gdungs pa mthong na/ snyan pa sgra'i tshig gis bdag la khyed mya ngan ma byed cig /khyod kyi phyir kho bos rgyal po'am/ blon po chen po la gsol ba btab ste/ gal te na nor gsug sbyin pa'am/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ci nas kyang khyod mi

bde ba'i sdug bsngal las thar bar bya'o zhes zer na/ bdag gis tshig de thos pa tsam gyis sems dga' bar 'gyur te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni shes par bya ba'i sgyu rtsal dang bzo'i bar du yang mthar phyin par brtson 'grus su slob bo/ /'di lta ste/

shes par bya ba rig pa'i gnas dang / bzo'i gnas dang / rol mo dang / rtsed mo dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / mig 'phrul gyi sngags dang / sman dang / ban glang dang / rta dang / bzhon pa dang / dgra chos dang / dmag drang ba dang / dpyad la sogs

pa la mkhas par slob ste/ de ltar sgyu rtsal ci la yang mkhas par bslabs nas 'gro ba mang po dang / rgyal po dang / blon po chen po la sogs pa yang bsams pa'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byed/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang longs spyod kyi rkyen gos sam/ nor
ram/ zas sam/ bza' ba'am/ btung ba'am/ nor bu'am/ gdu bu'am/ lus kyi rgyan nam/ gser ram/ dngul lam/ bai dUr+ya'am/ byi ru'am/ man shel lam/ spug gam/ mu tig gam/ a mra gar b+ha'am/ nor bu

rin po che'am/ ban glang ngam/ rta'am/ theg pa'am/ bran po'am/ las byed pa'i mi'am/ chung ma'am/ slas kyang yod/ chu mig gam/ khrus kyi rdzing bu'am/ rin po che'i yang tog bzang po'am/ longs spyod kyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs yod

kyang byang chub sems dpa' de la rlom pa'am rgyags pa'i sems med do/ /de ltar sgyu rtsal kun la yang mkhas/ rin po che'i bang mdzod brgya stong dang yang ldan/ ban glang dang / rta dang / theg pa yang yod/ na chung bzang mo yang grangs med par yod/ yang tog

bzang po yang yod/ chu mig dang khrus kyi rdzing bu la sogs pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gang yang yod mod kyi/ de la ma chags te rtag tu 'dod pa nyung ba dang / chog shes pa la dga' zhing / bas mtha' dgon pa dang / ri dang / tshal dang / shing drung du bsam gtan la

zhi bar gnas pa la mos so/ /skye bo mang po dang / smra zhing gtam zer yang / sems ni rtag tu gnyen po'i sgor 'jug par byed do/ /so so'i skye bo dang spyod tshul 'thun pa ltar byed kyang sems can la phan pa'i don du nor bu rin po che gtong bar byed kyis sems can la

gnod pa mi phan pa'i don mi byed do/ /gang dbul ba/ phongs pa nyam thag par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpa' la slong du 'ongs na de la ci 'dod pa bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sbyin par byed do/ /sems can gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos shing dad de byang

chub sems dpa' la bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rim gro dang g.yog byed cing rkang pa 'khru ba'i las byed dam/ lus bkru ba dang mnye ba'i las byed dam/ chag chag dang phyag dar byed dam/ so shing dang khrus chur sbyor ram/ mal stan 'dings shing mal

gos sprug pa'i las byed dam/ srod dang tho rangs la mar me 'bud dam/ khye'u sus dang / dro la kha zas tha na pa na dang / pu she na dang / kha da ne 'bul lam/ 'thung ba'i skom yu li shi dang / bu la sha ka'i 'bras bu'i skom dang / rgun chu dang / kha ra nag po'i chu la sogs

pa sbyar sbyar nas yo byad de lta bus zhag bdun nas zhag dgu bcu'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' la chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'bul bar byed na byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe mchod pa'i yo byad 'bul ba de la dga' ba'i sems med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang

chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa yun ring po nas sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la skyed 'bri'i sems med pa'i phyir/ byams pa dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir/ mnyam snyoms pa'i sems la gnas pa'i phyir

ro/ /de bas na dus kha cig tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed de/ rtag tu dge ba bcu'i chos kyis sems can gyi don byed do/ /sems can de dag kyang rgyal po'i yid bzhin du dga' zhing spyod pas tshe'i dus byas na yang lha dang mi'i 'jig rten du 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod

mchog dam pa dang ldan te/ rigs che zhing mtho bar skye bar 'gyur/ bsams pa'i yid bzhin du nyal ba dang / ldang ba dang / 'gro ba la gnod pa med par 'gyur/ gnas gang du 'gro yang bzhon pa'i rta dang theg par ldan te skyed mos tshal du rtsed mo dang rol mo la rtse zhing

longs spyod par 'gyur/ bza' ba dang btung ba dam pa dang dga' dgur spyod par 'gyur yang tha ma mi rtag pa bsten te/ rga ba dang na bas gzir te shi bar gyur na khyim gyi bu smad mya ngan gyis gdungs te skad phyung nas ngu zhing la la ni mgo la thal mo rdebs/ la la ni rang rang gi skra

'bal te mchi ma 'dzag cing sa la 'gre'o/ /de nas khyogs sam shing rta'i steng du bzhag nas dur khrod du bskyel te/ de ltar bskyal nas kyang bu smad dag phyir khyim du 'ongs nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te la la ni brgyal nas sa la 'gre /la la ni de'i rkyen gyis nad du 'gyur/ la

la ni mi dran nas myos/ la la ni tshe'i bar chad du shi bar byas te/ de ltar byas kyang gson pa rnams la ni phan pa med/ shi ba la ni rab tu gnod do/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas te yul rgyu zhing song ba las sems can mya ngan gyis

gzir ba mthong nas snying brtse ba'i sems skyes te 'di skad zer ro/ /rgyal po zhes bya ba ni yul sa dbang gis 'gro ba mang po'i dbang sgyur te/ de ltar dge ba bcu'i lam gyis 'gro ba rnams btul te/ 'bras bu 'dod pa lnga mchog dam pa thob tu zin kyang skye ba dang / rga ba dang /
